author: pbwest
msg: Created AreaNode, extending Node, as a superclass of Area,
without any geometry.  Done to support Page, a class at the root
of all page areas, which maintains meta-data about the page,

author: pbwest
msg: Removed startVParea because of reference to ctm transformer

author: pbwest
msg: Moved getWritingMode from CorrespondingProperties to FONode

author: pbwest
msg: Added isHorizontal and isLeftToRight methods, mimicking methods
of the same name in java.awt.ComponentOrientation

author: pbwest
msg: Changes for padding corresponding absolute properties
